src:
They said what?! Pros react to Stephen Thompson’s bloody win over Vicente Luque at UFC 244
03 Nov 2019, 03:43 by Lucas Rezende



In an exciting and pure striking battle, Stephen Thompson showed to be the more technical striker and picked up a dominant unanimous decision win over Vicente Luque at UFC 244. On Twitter, pro fighters enjoyed the bout.































































Watch ‘UFC 244 - ‘MASVIDAL VS DIAZ’ Stream all the fights broadcast LIVE — don’t miss a single second of face-punching action! Plus, you get access to the best of the UFC Archives & more! GET THE FIGHTS!
